docs.text: arnold schwarzenegger has been an icon for action enthusiasts , since the late 80's , but lately his films have been very sloppy and the one-liners are getting worse .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's hard seeing arnold as mr . freeze in batman and robin , especially when he says tons of ice jokes , but hey he got 15 million , what's it matter to him ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: once again arnold has signed to do another expensive blockbuster , that can't compare with the likes of the terminator series , true lies and even eraser .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in this so called dark thriller , the devil ( gabriel byrne ) has come upon earth , to impregnate a woman ( robin tunney ) which happens every 1000 years , and basically destroy the world , but apparently god has chosen one man , and that one man is jericho cane ( arnold himself ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with the help of a trusty sidekick ( kevin pollack ) , they will stop at nothing to let the devil take over the world !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: parts of this are actually so absurd , that they would fit right in with dogma .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yes , the film is that weak , but it's better than the other blockbuster right now ( sleepy hollow ) , but it makes the world is not enough look like a 4 star film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: anyway , this definitely doesn't seem like an arnold movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it just wasn't the type of film you can see him doing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sure he gave us a few chuckles with his well known one-liners , but he seemed confused as to where his character and the film was going .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's understandable , especially when the ending had to be changed according to some sources .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: aside form that , he still walked through it , much like he has in the past few films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i'm sorry to say this arnold but maybe these are the end of your action days .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: speaking of action , where was it in this film ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there was hardly any explosions or fights .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the devil made a few places explode , but arnold wasn't kicking some devil butt .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the ending was changed to make it more spiritual , which undoubtedly ruined the film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i was at least hoping for a cool ending if nothing else occurred , but once again i was let down .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i also don't know why the film took so long and cost so much .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there was really no super affects at all , unless you consider an invisible devil , who was in it for 5 minutes tops , worth the overpriced budget .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the budget should have gone into a better script , where at least audiences could be somewhat entertained instead of facing boredom .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's pitiful to see how scripts like these get bought and made into a movie .

docs.text: do they even read these things anymore ?
docs.label: negative
